articles.description: Jamie Smith will be a "world-class player over a long period of time", according to former England international and Sri Lanka batting coach Ian Bell.
articles.title: Jamie Smith: Ian Bell says England keeper will be 'world class for long period'

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola is "happy" that the hearing into the 115 charges facing the club will begin soon.
articles.title: Man City 115 charges: Pep Guardiola 'happy' hearing will begin soon

articles.description: Jenas, who was sacked over allegations he sent inappropriate messages to colleagues, has spoken to the Sun.
articles.title: Jermaine Jenas says he is ashamed after BBC sacking

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Borussia M'gladbach vs Bayer Leverkusen in the Bundesliga
articles.title: Borussia M'gladbach vs Bayer Leverkusen: Bundesliga - BBC Sport

articles.description: Napoli are close to signing Romelu Lukaku from Chelsea for about £30m after a breakthrough in talks.
articles.title: Romelu Lukaku: Napoli close to signing Chelsea striker

articles.description: Jannik Sinner says he is no longer working with physiotherapist Giacomo Naldi and fitness trainer Umberto Ferrara following the investigation into his positive tests for a banned substance.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Jannik Sinner parts with physiotherapist and fitness coach

articles.description: Nelly Korda has a three-shot lead after a blemish-free 68 in the second round of the Women's Open at St Andrews.
articles.title: Women's Open 2024: Nelly Korda three shots clear Charley Hull & Lilia Vu at St Andrews after second round

articles.description: Chelsea fans are put to the test to see how many players they can name from Enzo Maresca's 42-man squad.
articles.title: How many players can Chelsea fans name from their 42-man squad?

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka says she has been finding "things which bring joy" as she aims to end a challenging year with her first US Open title.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Aryna Sabalenka finding 'things which bring joy' as she bids for third Slam title

articles.description: George Russell says he expects “a close battle” between Mercedes, McLaren and Red Bull’s Max Verstappen after setting the pace in Friday practice at the Dutch Grand Prix.
articles.title: George Russell predicts 'close' Dutch GP fight
